translation.about: I'm a frontend developer focused on modern, accessible, and responsive interfaces. I work with React, Next.js, and Tailwind, combining tech and design to build intuitive digital experiences. In my free time, I enjoy to play video-games, learning animations, listening to music, and exploring minimalist design.
translation.contactFormText: Please enter your name, e-mail and your message. I'll return soon as possible!
translation.easyBankDescription: Responsive landing page developed for the fictional bank EasyBank as part of a front-end challenge, built with React and focused on modern design and high performance.
translation.adviceDescription: Simple and responsive application that generates random pieces of advice, built as a personal project using React and styled-components, with focus on clean design and API integration.
translation.tipCalculatorDescription: Responsive tip calculator developed as a personal project using React, with emphasis on user-friendly design and accurate real-time calculations.
translation.cinetagDescription: Study project focused on React fundamentals, Cinetag allows users to explore and categorize movies with dynamic filtering and routing.
translation.productPageDescription: Responsive product page for an e-commerce layout, developed as a personal project using React and Tailwind CSS, with attention to design consistency and mobile-first approach.
translation.pokedexDescription: Study project that consumes the PokéAPI to display Pokémon information. Built with React and Axios, featuring pagination and real-time search.
translation.loginInstagramDescription: Responsive replica of Instagram's login screen, created as a personal project using HTML and CSS to practice layout replication and visual fidelity.
